variants.description in input context: Point mutation K48A in parkin leads to the loss of ubiquitin-like domain function and reduces its degradation capacity.
Point mutation R42P in parkin disrupts ubiquitin-like domain function and causes poor protein stability.

variants.description: Point mutation K48A in parkin reduces ubiquitin-like domain function and decreases its degradation capacity.
Point mutation R42P in parkin disrupts ubiquitin-like domain function and causes poor protein stability.
